name: Pine Comet

weaponEffects.title: Flame Resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase flame ATK by **20%** and flame resistance by **40%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more flame weapons. This set effect also works with weapons in the off-hand slot. Effect does not stack with Flame Resonance.

weaponEffects.title: Explosive Flame - Field
weaponEffects.description: When Pine Comet hits an enemy with any attack, deal damage equal to (**1500%** of ATK + **25%** * max HP + **900%** * sum of all elemental resistances + **3000%** * crit dmg) to nearby targets, which can be triggered once every **1.5** seconds. This damage is seen as normal attack damage. For every weapon different than Flame equipped, increase the explosion damage by **2.5**. This damage is not affected by damage increasing or decreasing effects other than the rare attributes of Titan Gear, and will not trigger normal attack effects.

advancements: When a **sparrowfeather** hits a target, a diffusion effect is created, dealing damage equal to **85%** of ATK on the initial target, and spreads the **Ignited Sparrow** effect to nearby targets while refreshing the duration of **Ignited Sparrow**. Cooldown: **5** seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

When your HP is under **50%**, consume **1 sparrowfeather** every **0.5** seconds and recover **2%** of max HP until max HP is reached or all **sparrowfeathers** are used. While not in a team, increase this effect to **4%**. This effect also works in the off-hand slot.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

When you receive fatal damage, negate fatal damage once and gain immunity for a short period of time, and immediately get **60 sparrowfeathers** and **1000** weapon charge. This effect can be triggered once every 60 seconds, and also works in the background.
When you are in the **ultimate** state, increase flame damage by an additional **20%**.

abilities.name: Brush
abilities.description: When on the ground, press normal attack to perform seven consecutive attacks.

abilities.name: Flying Text
abilities.description: While airborne, press normal attack to attack 7 times in the air while consuming endurance.

abilities.name: Manga
abilities.description:
Spinning attack, dealing damage equal to **1,220.9%** of ATK + **64** to nearby targets and knocking them back.

After triggering Man Book, use normal attack to trigger Ranhan.

Arc displacement, dealing damage equal to **143.6%** + **8** to nearby targets, and floating them.

After triggering Ranhan, press normal attack to trigger Falling Paper.

After triggering Falling Paper, press and hold normal attack to trigger Finishing Touch.

abilities.name: Falling Paper
abilities.description: Kick the target, dealing damage equal to **287.3%** of ATK + **15** to nearby targets and float them. Then release the Suzaku attack, dealing damage equal to **359.1%** of ATK + **19** to nearby targets, and finally fall from the sky, dealing damage equal to **790%** of ATK + **42** and float the target. After triggering Falling Paper, press and hold normal attack to trigger Finishing Touch.

abilities.name: Finishing Touch
abilities.description: Erupts flames, dealing damage equal to **754.1%** of ATK + **40** to the target in front.

abilities.name: Easily Cut
abilities.description: Fall from the sky, dealing damage equal to **395%** of ATK + **21** to nearby targets and floating them when landing.

abilities.name: Small Seal Script
abilities.description:
Every time a normal attack hits an enemy, there is a **50%** chance to generate calligraphy characters.

**Yan**: Condensed Yan energy, dealing damage equal to **200%** of ATK + **11** to the target, can be triggered once every **12** seconds.

**Break**: Detonate the flames, dealing damage equal to **50%** of ATK + **3** to nearby targets. Can be triggered once every **7** seconds.

**Attract**: Pull flames, absorb nearby targets and deal damage equal to **200%** of ATK + **11**. Can be triggered once every **15** seconds.

abilities.name: Sparrowfeather
abilities.description:
Pine Comet's attacks can launch a **sparrowfeather** to the locked target, dealing damage equal to **120%** of ATK to nearby targets. Can be triggered every **1** second.

When Pine Comet is in the off-hand slot, any attack of other weapons can also launch a **sparrowfeather** to the locked target. Can be triggered once every **2** seconds.

The initial amount of **sparrowfeathers** is **30**, and it can stack up to **60**.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

**Passive**: Gain **15** **sparrowfeathers** on yourself.

abilities.name: Inkstone Drop
abilities.description:
Splash pen and ink, dealing damage equal to **603.3%** of ATK + **32** to nearby targets.

**Passive**: Slow nearby targets by **65%** for **2** seconds (not effective against bosses or players), and form a line of fire, apply a **50%** deceleration effect on nearby targets, and deal damage equal to **120%** of ATK + **6** every second for **7** seconds (multiple lines of fire do not increase the damage).

abilities.name: Pen
abilities.description:
Splash pen and ink, dealing damage equal to **1,285.2%** of ATK + **68** to nearby targets.

**Passive**: Apply a **65%** slow effect on nearby targets for **2** seconds (not effective against bosses or players), and form a circle of fire, apply a **50%** deceleration effect on nearby targets and deal damage equal to **120%** of ATK + **6** every second for **7** seconds (multiple circles of fire do not increase the damage).

abilities.name: Four-Way Sparrow
abilities.description:
Turn yourself into multiple ink clones, gain temporary invincibility and deal damage equal to **480.8%** of ATK + **25** to nearby targets, then gather ink to release ink power, absorb nearby targets and deal damage equal to **1,169.3%** of ATK + **62**.

Cooldown: **25** seconds.

Gather the ink clones on the field, and release the Suzaku form, dealing damage equal to (amount of calligraphy characters on the field + amount of ink clones, up to **8**) * **531.6%** of ATK to nearby targets, enter the **ultimate** state, and ignore **30%** of flame resistance on targets for 30 seconds.

Cooldown: **25** seconds.


Based on the amount on calligraphy characters collected, the **ultimate** status will provide different additional effects.

**Effects**:

When collecting **1** 'discharge' character, increase discharge damage by **16%**.

When collecting **2** 'discharge' characters, increase shatter by **20%**.

When collecting **1** 'skill' character, increase skill damage by **16%**.

When collecting **2** 'skill' characters, reduce the cooldown of **Four-Way Sparrow** by **5** seconds.

When collecting **1** 'dodge' character, increase dodge attack damage by **20%**.

When collecting **2** 'dodge' characters, instantly get **3** dodge attempts.

When collecting **1** 'attack' character, increase normal attack damage  by **20%**.

When collecting **2** 'attack' characters, gain **5%** damage reduction during normal attack.

For every calligraphy character collected, gain **2** seconds of hyperbody, up to **16** seconds.

**Passive: Calligraphy Characters**

Using any weapon's weapon discharge/skill/dodge/normal attack will drop the corresponding calligraphy character.

Discharge: Use any discharge to drop **1** 'discharge' character.

Skill: Use any weapon skill to drop **1** 'skill' character.

Dodge: Use **2** dodges to drop **1** 'dodge' character.

Attack: Use **4** normal attacks to drop **1** attack character.

A maximum of **2** characters of each type can be obtained.

abilities.name: Light Speculation
abilities.description:
When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder** upon switching to this weapon, and sweep forward, dealing damage equal to **2,801%** of ATK + **147** to nearby targets, knocking them back. Damage immunity lasts for **2.6** seconds while the skill is active (unavailable in Apex League).

**Passive: Ignited Sparrow**:

When using a Flame weapon's weapon discharge, add **1** stack of **Ignited Sparrow** to the target, dealing damage equal to **100%** of ATK every second, lasting for **15** seconds. Up to **2** stacks can be added.

recommendedMatrices.name: Garnett
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set for both flame and rainbow comps, only use 4-piece on Pine Comet.

recommendedMatrices.name: Shiro
recommendedMatrices.description: Great set effects for both shatter and consistent damage increase. Use 4 set for quick fights, otherwise pair with 2-set Samir or 2-set Crow.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: At high crit rate, Crow's 2 set is the second best choice for damage.

recommendedMatrices.name: Samir
recommendedMatrices.description: Because of the quick and frequent attacks, Pine Comet can easily maintain 100% uptime on the buff.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
